text: Mana emioyo chienyu nichiba emiumu okhurula hao, nichiba shinga amachina nohomba okhushilakhwo amachina, shichila amachina kandi kaliho karulangamwo emialo, ne akandimwo kaliho katikhanga nikarula amaatsi, ne akandi kaliho kakwitsanga khulwokhuria Nyasaye (Ne enywe abayahudi shimutilikhangakho khu liosi liosi) Ne Nyasaye shang’ang’alilanga akamukholanga tawe
